Btw even though you might think that this presentation of black guys as "chads" in ntr porn is some kind of compliment its still based off some racist ideas. the BBC fetish is essentially rooted in the dehumanization of the black "stud." It is taboo becausec the white women(japanese women in this case) are perceived as delicate or pristine and the black man is an insanely proportioned (aka inherently, biologically "different" due to his race), animalistic sex machine.
Beyond the obvious of how this perception is racist it also creates a really ridiculous standard for black men to live up to. Men already struggle with confidence regarding their size so for black men who arent "huge" or really aggressive and macho it creates an even bigger issue.

@l0lic0nwizard, that's what I'm talking about. In the pro scene weight matter because we have rules that give advantage to those who are bigger and heavier, wherever in a free for all, skill, experience, and being cunning, are much more important. I believe the fight would be easier to the little guy, thanks to the fact that he showsuch more experience and skill. And yeah, I know that there are plot reason that make demand the bigger guy to win here, but I'm just pointing this out because I'm annoyed by the repost and wanted to point this flaw.

Usually I wouldn't be so annoyed at logical flaws in a story, but since this keeps getting reposted, I started to think: The whole setup for this manga doesn't make sense. The little guy could totally have winned, since we saw that he isn't physically weak, and giving his agility, endurance, and experience in fighting, that the story pointed out to us. It doesn't make sense that he lost two times. He is able to run with various tires attached to him, has knowledge in martial arts, is physically build, has experience in fighting, he's clearly the better fighter, and there's a lot of ways that he could have winned against the other guy. And @Riad69, the kid isn't a Nazi, and that isn't how weight difference works, being bigger doesn't mean that you're made of iron or that a smaller fight isn't gonna be able to injury or outsmart you
